name: Aeroclub San Marino
about: Aeroclub San Marino is a renowned flying school and club based at Torraccia Airfield in the Republic of San Marino. Established in 1985, the club offers comprehensive courses for obtaining private and commercial pilot licenses. The flight school is regulated by the Authority for Civil Aviation and Maritime Navigation of San Marino, ensuring strict adherence to safety regulations. The airfield features a 650-meter grass runway and hosts various aviation activities, including flying school for ultralight aircraft, flights for member pilots, and tourist flights on two-seater and four-seater aircraft. The club also organizes events and provides technical services, including refueling options. With a strong focus on safety and hospitality, Aeroclub San Marino offers a unique and enriching aviation experience in the heart of the oldest republic in the world.
